Onboarding.title: Website Project Questionnaire
Onboarding.introduction: This questionnaire will help us gather all the necessary information to create a professional website that perfectly represents your business and helps you achieve your goals. Please be as detailed as possible.
Onboarding.officialNameHelp: This is for legal and copyright purposes.
Onboarding.websiteDisplayNameHelp: The name that will appear prominently in your site header and branding.
Onboarding.sloganPlaceholder: E.g., Authentic and private treks in the High Atlas, guided by local Berbers.
Onboarding.logoHelp: If yes, please upload it in a high-quality format (PNG, SVG).
Onboarding.sloganHelp: A catchy phrase describing your business.
Onboarding.businessCategoryHelp: What type of business are you?
Onboarding.industrySpecificsHelp: Briefly describe your main services or products. E.g., 'Airport transfers, day trips to Ourika Valley, Sahara tours', or 'Handmade leather goods'.
Onboarding.industrySpecificsPlaceholder: E.g., Airport transfers, day trips to Ourika Valley
Onboarding.primaryColorHelp: This is the primary color for buttons, links, and key elements. If you know the hex code, great. Otherwise, just describe it.
Onboarding.secondaryColorHelp: A second color to complement your primary color.
Onboarding.templateThemeHelp: Choose a theme that best reflects your brand's style. This will dictate the overall look and feel.
Onboarding.addressPlaceholder: Your main office or meeting point
Onboarding.whatsappNumberHelp: If you use WhatsApp for business communication, please provide the number.
Onboarding.aboutUsContentPlaceholder: Tell us your company's story, mission, and values. This will be the content for your 'About Us' page.
Onboarding.aboutUsContentHelp: A brief overview of your company's history, mission, and what makes you unique.
Onboarding.serviceDescriptionPlaceholder: E.g., We offer private airport transfers, guided tours of Marrakech, and multi-day desert trips.
Onboarding.serviceDescriptionHelp: Provide a detailed description of the main services or tour types you offer.
Onboarding.tourLocationsServedPlaceholder: E.g., Imlil & High Atlas, Marrakech Excursions, Agafay Desert
Onboarding.tourLocationsServedHelp: List the main cities, regions, or destinations where your tours operate, separated by commas.
Onboarding.paymentMethodsAcceptedHelp: What payment methods do you accept from customers?
Onboarding.websiteLanguageOptionsHelp: Which languages should your website be available in?
Onboarding.keywordsPlaceholder: E.g., atlas mountains trek, morocco hiking, imlil guide (list 5-10 words/phrases customers search)
Onboarding.keywordsHelp: Please list 5-10 words or phrases customers would typically search on Google to find your business, separated by commas.
Onboarding.socialShareImageHelp: Provide a beautiful, high-quality photo that best represents your business. This image will appear when your website link is shared on social media.
Onboarding.reviewsSystemHelp: Allows customers to leave and display reviews directly on your site to build trust.
Onboarding.blogSystemHelp: A blog to share stories, updates, and attract more visitors from Google.
Onboarding.bookingEngineHelp: A form or system allowing customers to request or make reservations with specific dates and preferences.
Onboarding.experiencesSectionHelp: A structured section to showcase your specific tours, packages, or unique experiences.
Onboarding.faqSectionHelp: An organized section to answer common customer questions, reducing direct inquiries.
Onboarding.formSuccess: Thank you! Your questionnaire has been submitted successfully. We will contact you shortly!
Onboarding.formError: An error occurred. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact us directly.
